observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc
observations.Name: Joao Demenjon
observations.Description of Observation:
When latching hycs. sse wasn’t putting out enough effort. He signaled the driller to come up without looking to see if the casing had jumped out of the skate, it had, I immediately grabbed the casing while he latched it.

I had explained to him before and did again, you can’t flag the driller up before seeing wether it’s safe to do so.

He started doing so bad at hycs I latched them for 1.5 hours. And then we 3 manned it because he just couldn’t get it.

I would like to change sse’s.
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Explaining the dangers of flagging without looking

observations.Description of Observation:
Driller and kept trying too come up before tongs were off pipe 
And skate operator kept moving pipe while had was inserting lift nubbing

observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc
observations.Name: Jason Worthen
observations.Description of Observation: Made sure to use good hand placement and foot placement as well as good questions with skate operator and drill when latching elevators and tilling it in and to use ski rope when pulling on the tongs when boxing the casing join. And to stay out the red zone when the casing joint is coming down.

observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc
observations.Name: Roger Gray
observations.Description of Observation: I want to recognize me and my crew for always checking are units and tools when we get on location. They already had the main unit by the rig with the hoses on the floor. We checked the unitto see if it would start and kept dieing after multiple times so we swapped units. This saved us down time from the beginning of the job . They had 6000 ft left to trip so I already had another unit on the way before we ever started. Great job crew
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Swapped out units before job

observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc

observations.Description of Observation: After rigging up I noticed there was a keeper missing in the shackle for the vdoor rope

observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc
observations.Name: Skylar Mayfield
observations.Description of Observation: When running casing I noticed the offside winch had slack so it was hanging on inside of derrick up top
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: I stopped an walked over to offside and tightened up on it to prevent it possibly getting snagged in the top drive or Kelly line

observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc

observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Put keeper in shackle

observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc
observations.Name: Roger Gray
observations.Description of Observation: Rotary table kept coming unlocked
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Told driller if rotary table kept coming unlocked it was a hazards to equipment and personal. He said it does it sometimes. So we jammed the locks and it didn't not come unlocked any more plus had secondary safety chain on fm

observations.Description of Observation: Poly crew member was wearing H2S monitor on back of hard hat.
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Coached employee on wearing H2S monitor 6-9 inches of breathing zone.

observations.Description of Observation: Safty man wants to fill up and Signature the rigging down safety JSA

observations.Company: Butch's Rat Hole & Anchor Service Inc
observations.Name: Heath Jones
observations.Description of Observation: Driller kept running down casing fast all the way to the end making it hard to get slips set with out him smashing and stacking out on them
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: So stopped the job and went in the dog house ad asked him if he could slow down a little at the end so the guys could get the slips in the hole be for he stacked out on the slips he said cool and it worked out got back to running casing no more issues

observations.Name: Jacob King
observations.Description of Observation: While installing collar clamp I noticed a keeper had broke

observations.Is the crew maintaining proper body posi: Crew is doing a good job with their positioning and minding line of fire areas and pinch points
observations.Describe the crew members hand placement: Crew is using ski ropes to guide the elevators to the pipe and using proper hand placement to close them
observations.Were any best practices or safe behavior: Crew did a good job communicating with each other and the rig crew.

Name: Rene Rubio Jr
Francisco Toledo
Kirby Chandler
Jonathon Rice
Jose Villarreal
German Martinez
observations.Comments On SSE and Mentor Performance:: Working together on rig up and on the rig floor
observations.Is the crew maintaining proper body posi: Crew members maintaining proper body positioning while handling tongs
observations.Describe the crew members hand placement: No issues with handling the elevators
observations.Were any best practices or safe behavior: Mentor hands on training to SSE

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation:
Rig personnel used the top drive to lift the BOP and the forklift for stability. Moving the BOP in order to remove the spool from the bottom and replace it with the wellhead. Requiring personnel to be in the immediate area entirely reliant on the chains used. 

My suggestion would be to use a pole truck in the future to minimize potential risks involved with the movement of the BOP and personnel that need to be around during certain portions of the task.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation: While removing the spool from the bottom of the BOP in order to add the wellhead. This was done with pre-discussed thought out actions to make it the safest possible.  Communication and awareness during the task were on point.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Name: Christopher Lopez
observations.Description of Observation: While moving and setting the trip tank highly effective communication was demonstrated amongst rig personnel marking the move as safe as possible.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Name: Michael Zaricor III
observations.Description of Observation: Employee was backing the forklift while 3 third party personnel were walking by.  Michael Zaricor noticed it and yelled for the forklift to stop.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation: The crew used a tag line when unloading the Casing running tool  (CRT) down from the rig floor.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation: Third party cementers flagged off their cement line on both sides to bring awareness to the high pressure line.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Name: Michael Vinson
observations.Description of Observation: While picking up first joint of casing I noticed a pin was loose and about to fall out of the tilt cylinder on the top drive.
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Stopped the job. Reinstalled pin and keeper and checked the other pins on top drive

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation: Buffer zones were not established around the catwalk.
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Driller and pusher were notified and the correct chains/ flashing were put into place correctly.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation: Guard rails around the cellar were not in place worth the grating open.
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Everything was stopped immediately and the guard rails were put into place and work resumed.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation: Housekeeping around pump 2 was determined insufficient.
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Driller was notified and all tools and trash were picked up immediately.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Description of Observation: Lifting strap was found to be frayed.
observations.What Action / Correction was Taken?: Lifting strap was taken out of service and replaced.

observations.Company: Transcend Drilling Company Inc
observations.Name: Danny Muro
observations.Description of Observation: Everyone in location was wearing proper P.P.E, had all jsas and permits for rigging up
